content: Always specify exact Docker image versions (e.g., qdrant/qdrant:v1.16.3) instead of 'latest' to ensure reproducible builds and avoid breaking changes.
Use multi-stage Docker builds to reduce final image size. Build dependencies in one stage, copy only runtime artifacts to final stage.
Run containers as non-root user for security. Create dedicated user in Dockerfile: RUN useradd -m -u 1000 appuser && chown -R appuser:appuser /app
